title: Camp Teletoon API
subTitle: Summer 2013
role: Designed and developed the API for Teletoon.com's flagship summer promotion: Camp Teletoon.

details.description: The php API managed all user registration, progress, scoring and contest entries over the nine-week duration of Camp Teletoon, specifically:
items: returning code-based power-ups for the main game
storing user progress by stage, overall stages, in both whole numbers and decimal percentages
tracking user game play statistics by stage, and overall, as a key metric of success
storing user contest entries by stage, and overall, as a key metric of success
awarding bonus entries based on a user's proximity to completing a stage
determining a user's rank, by stage and overall
determining the nearest users either side of the current user in order to plot along a quadratic curve
